name: Fpally Bird
description:
This project was made in 1 hour during my second year. For this exercise, I imposed myself several constraints: - A maximum of 2 hours before rendering.  - Not allowed to use an existing project or watch Youtube's video.  - Don't ask for any help. This exercise allowed me to better manage the pressure and to understand how this game became famous. We can consider it as a "little rush". The game is easy to play, just click on the screen.

For the sprites I used this site :

- https://www.spriters-resource.com/mobile/flappybird/sheet/59894/

And for the font : 

- https://www.dafont.com/04b-19.font
